function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Air-handling systems may require more regular filter-maintenance protocols.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased airflow rates that primarily improve recirculated indoor air delivery may raise transmission possibilities.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited social-distancing controls in hospitals.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate social-distancing controls in hospitals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective design of protective environments and isolation rooms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High cost and visual barriers associated with anterooms","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor ventilation leading to airborne transmission of infectious agents","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate containment measures leading to spread of viruses between spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trade-offs between safety and cost in healthcare facility design","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air purification","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of natural ventilation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of natural ventilation and reliance on artificial environmental conditions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High levels of pollution without adequate disinfection and purification processes","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air filtration systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of unsafe building materials","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cross-contamination from improper disposal of internal filters","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poorly designed hospital spaces that do not consider infectious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of integrated thermal space conditioning and ventilation provisions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate triaging and examination procedures for patients with infectious disease symptoms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air purification and ventilation may lead to the transmission of airborne infectious diseases within buildings.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Larger droplets gravitationally pulled to surfaces within 1-2m","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-lasting small aerosols with potential to transmit infection over great distances","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of airflow patterns on the spread of infectious aerosols","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning processes and supplies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of coordination between engineering disciplines","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate design approaches for infection prevention","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Architects and engineers lacking training in public health may lead to designs with inadequate sunlight access impacting indoor viral communities.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate utilization of natural ventilation and filtration systems may result in an unhealthy indoor environment.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited incorporation of sunlight into lighting designs in healthcare settings may lead to increased reliance on artificial lighting and inadequate infection control.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete literature review may lead to oversight of important factors in building design for disease mitigation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data on different types of buildings and ventilation systems may result in incomplete understanding of their impact on disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying on simulation models without comprehensive data may lead to inaccurate or unreliable design principles for disease mitigation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient understanding of the impact of ventilation and air conditioning systems on disease transmission may result in ineffective building design","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate focus on efficient and sustainable health engineering design systems may lead to the implementation of suboptimal building design strategies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 among construction workers due to close physical proximity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delays in project execution due to limitations on the number of workers allowed on construction sites","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of the economic recovery of nations due to impacts on construction industry","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 among construction stakeholders","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited productivity on construction operations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of skilled workers and materials","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of personal protection equipment supply","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complying with social distancing mandates on construction sites","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to covid-19 among construction workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on contractual issues and project management","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial impacts on construction companies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Material shortage and lack of supplies for construction projects","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workforce reduction due to pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workforce reduction in public agencies impacting permit oversight for construction projects","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"In-person interviews conducted at construction sites may expose researchers and interviewees to contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
